Articles.Content:
False

The user below me has just read the post my signature links to

false, read your post and purposefully didn't look at the signature (but I will look after I click post reply)

the user below me has used his username on another site before...

Well, I always use this username on forums.

The user below me unhappy with Whackjob's pc dying

True, while I personally haven't seen any of his work I am aware that he entertains the community and that such a loss is quite a hit.

The user below me was/is a Whackjob fan.

True-ish. I don't follow him all that much but I like what he does.

The user below me has built a computer for his/herself or someone else.

no...not yet.

The user below me has contributed to the whack-fund

False. I did not know there was a Whack-Fund (or even what the geep a Whack-fund is)

The user below me is secretly a kraken.

False, I am a straight-A student/overachiever

The user below me has a PSVita

False. I did not know there was a Whack-Fund (or even what the geep a Whack-fund is)

lots of people started donating money to whackjob so he could get back to KSPing and Whackjobing faster

anywas, true. I quite enjoyed ripping your Jool mission apart last week...

The user below me has felt my wrath many times before

false, first time I've had contact with you.

The user below me ninja'd the user below him.

Kind of true, depending on how you look at it and what length of time you class as being the "ninja zone".

the user below me just watched the Soyuz launch.

False I watched the magic pineapple launch

the user below my is a magician of some kind

True, because science is just magic that we understand.

The user below me has visited every biome in the Kerbin system including all the ones on Kerbin.

False, sadly i usually just test experimental designs and try to perfect current ones even though i am capable of reaching past duna with ease

the user below me also does the same thing except has gone to Eeloo

True, I am just too lazy to do such things.

The user below me is a robot overlord.

Half right, I'm a robotic wolf, but not an overlord

The user below me has had cybernetic implants

False, but I'll be having titanium rods inserted into my spine in September... Does that count?

The user below me lives in the USA and envies the NHS .

False, I live in Malaysia.

The user below me has a colony on Laythe.

False, but you gave me an idea

The user below me is the user above me

Edited April 16, 2014 by 11JRidding

Um... probably not?

The user below can answer this question:

"Does a set of all sets contain itself?"

By definition, it must.

The user below me knows nothing.

True. I do know nothing. I also know other things.

The user below is tired of writing "the user below".

Eh, I'm not here that often, so not really.

The user below knows the colour of night, and the music of life.

I would, if I had eye implants. Sadly, I don't

The user below me has had their PC BlueScreen on them sometime in the past

True, especially on my old desktop, blue screen every time I watched a You Tube video at 480p or lower in full screen.

The user below me has crashed a ship into Jool.
